Package com.simsilica.lemur

Class CheckboxGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.lemur.CheckboxGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class CheckboxGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An object of class CheckboxGroup is used to create a set of checkboxes where only a single component can be activated.

    This class is similar to the javax.swing.ButtonGroup class of Java desktop, uses the same logic.

    Since:
    1.16.1-SNAPSHOT
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected​(CheckboxModel m,
                        boolean b)
        Sets the selected value for the CheckboxModel. Only one checkbox in the group may be selected at a time.
        Parameters:
        m - the CheckboxModel
        b - true if this checkbox is to be selected, otherwise false

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected​(CheckboxModel m)
        Returns whether a CheckboxModel is selected.
        Parameters:
        m - an isntance of CheckboxModel
        Returns:
        true if the checkbox is selected, otherwise returns false
